column3: str
Baidur is not very good at his job.
Speak with Baidur.
Oh, I am beginning to wonder if I will ever be able to sell my wares. I was so certain I could finally make a success of myself here as a trader...
Ah, hello there. Tell me, have you ever tried your hand at running your own market stall?
I myself have been struggling to sell much of anything of late. Observing someone else may be just what I need.
Let me know if you feel up to the challenge.
Are you willing to tend to my stall?
Tending to the merchant's stall will take several minutes. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
What will you say?
That is a shame indeed. Please do speak with me again if you change your mind.
Fantastic! I have a feeling I am going to learn a lot from observing you.
I have always prided myself on having a varied assortment of goods for sale. There should be something here for every kind of customer. The best of luck to you!
Listen carefully to each customer and choose something you think will meet their needs.
Oh my, quite a selection of food you have. Let me think, yesterday we had fish... Trader, what would you recommend for a bunch of growing boys with healthy appetites?
What will you say?
Grilled fish.
Cheese.
Mammoth thigh.
A tea brick.
Hmm, I am not so sure my boys would like that. I think I shall go and buy meat from another stall.
That does sound nice, doesn't it. I will take your finest mammoth thigh!
You have failed to make a sale. It appears the customer did not appreciate your recommendation.
You made a sale! Nicely done.
Give me a toy! Mummy said I could buy a toy because I've been good. I don't have much money so it should be something cheap. What can I buy?
What will you say?
A wooden horse.
A Kharaqiq board and pieces.
A cheap wooden flute.
A fancy multicolored doll.
That sounds like lots of fun! Give it to me!
It costs <Emphasis>how</Emphasis> much!? Mummy didn't give me <Emphasis>that</Emphasis> much money.
A flute? I've never played one before but maybe Daddy can teach me. I'll take it!
Oh, I pine for that buxom maiden so, but I know not how to express my feelings. Whatever should I do?
What will you say?
I've got just the book for you.
Scream of your love to all of Reunion.
Good things come to handsome gents.
You'll get nowhere with a face like that.
Sorry, did I look like I was soliciting advice? I was just heading home. I'll have you know I've a long night of crying myself to sleep ahead of me!
You have failed to make a sale. It appears the customer did not appreciate your recommendation.
A book, you say? Pray tell me, just what is it called?
What will you say?
<Emphasis>A Beginner's Guide to Tumet Child Rearing</Emphasis>.
<Emphasis>Swim Like an Ejinn</Emphasis>.
<Emphasis>Adarkim Tactics: Advanced Edition</Emphasis>.
<Emphasis>Qalli Love Songs of Legend</Emphasis>.
Are you mocking my love? There are other things I could be doing right now instead of taking your insults. I'll have you know I've a long night of crying myself to sleep ahead of me!
Love songs? Now that you mention it, I remember her saying she enjoyed music. I will take that book, thank you!
Do you think this necklace suits me? I just bought it from that stall over there.
What will you say?
Is that one of the eyes of Nidhogg!?
It looks lovely on you.
What a nice shade of scarlet.
We have even better jewelry here!
Tell me then, just what would you suggest I buy?
I am glad you think so! I fell in love with the color the moment I saw it and knew it had to be mine.
In fact, I had actually planned on buying two pieces of jewelry today. Do you have anything for sale?
What will you say?
Scarlet earrings.
A black bracelet.
A ruby ring.
A sapphire ring.
Ah, those would go perfectly with my necklace! I will have them, thank you.
That said, I am quite taken with this ruby ring as well... Give me both the earrings and this ring!
Hmm, I am not so sure the color would suit me. It is awfully drab. No, I think that is enough shopping for today.
That looks very nice indeed. I shall take it!
That said, those scarlet earrings would go perfectly with my necklace... Give me both the ring and the earrings!
I must say I am very impressed. I had no idea there was still so much I had to learn about trading.
Up until now I had simply recommended whatever I thought was best. But it is clear that the customer's wishes should always be my top priority.
Thank you for all your help.
Perhaps you ought to rest for a while. It seems like this may all be a bit too much for you right now. Speak with me whenever you feel ready to try again.
